problem.markdown:
1. CNC WOOD ROUTER HAS A ( ) 1 Axis ( ) 2 Axis (x) 3 Axis ( ) 4 Axis
2. MATERIAL USED FOR MILLING ON CNC WOOD ROUTER MACHINE IS ( ) Wood ( ) Plastic ( ) Metal (x) All of the above
3. FOR THROUGH PROFILE CUTTING OPERATION IN CNC WOOD ROUTER WHICH CUTTER IS PREFERABLE ? (x) Flat end mill Cutter ( ) Ball Nose end mill cutter ( ) V-Carve ( ) All of the above
4. END MILLING CUTTER HAS CUTTING EDGES ON (x) Side and bottom of the cutter ( ) Only side of the cutter ( ) Side and top of cutter ( ) only at the bottom
5. PROPER STEP OVER FOR END MILL CUTTER MUST BE ( ) Greater than 50% of tool diameter (x) Less than 50% of tool diameter ( ) Irrespective of tool diameter ( ) Can't say
problem.p: 2. MATERIAL USED FOR MILLING ON CNC WOOD ROUTER MACHINE IS
3. FOR THROUGH PROFILE CUTTING OPERATION IN CNC WOOD ROUTER WHICH CUTTER IS PREFERABLE ?
4. END MILLING CUTTER HAS CUTTING EDGES ON

choicegroup.choice: Side and bottom of the cutter

problem.p: 5. PROPER STEP OVER FOR END MILL CUTTER MUST BE
